TextView.android:text: 2 Word Beginning Ex- The word beginning ex- is represented by e-s.
3 Word Ending -ful The word ending -ful is represented by f.
4 Word Endings -cal, -cle The word endings -cal, -cle are represented by a disjoined k.
write To put words on paper.
I will write you about my plans.
right (noun) Something to which one has a just claim; (adjective) correct; (adverb) directly.
You have a right to expect good service from us.
Do you have the right time?
They are going right home after the meeting.
